name: Animus Music Visualizer
description:
Animus is a real-time 3D music visualizer that allows the user to easily control the graphics for a live performance. The graphics react to live input from the user's microphone, or line-in, which allows Animus to work seamlessly with live music.

Created by Torin Blankensmith & Cody Gibb

For any questions please contact: torin.blankensmith@gmail.com
